content: Methanolic leaf extract of Pericopsis laxiflora (benth. ex baker) meeuwen protects against cadmium-induced testicotoxicity in male sprague-dawley rats via antioxidant capabilities. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences, [S. l.], v. 14, n. 1, 2025. DOI: 10.53704/fujnas.v14i1.688. Disponível em: https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/688. Acesso em: 29 dec. 2025.
